trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the satellite assembly for the resources of the default culture is missing.
trans-unit.target: 預設文化特性資源的附屬組件遺漏時就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The default culture is the culture whose resources are loaded if the appropriate culture-specific resources cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 預設文化特性為載入其資源的如果找不到適當的特定文化特性資源的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: By default, resources for the default culture are located in the main assembly, and a <xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> is thrown if the resource manager tries to retrieve but cannot find a resource for the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設的預設文化特性的資源位於主要組件，與<xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>如果資源管理員會試著擷取，但找不到預設文化特性的資源，會擲回。</xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>

trans-unit.source: However, the .NET Framework will load the resources for an app's default culture from a satellite assembly if the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute specifies a value of <xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName> for the location parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不過，.NET Framework 會載入應用程式的預設文化特性的資源的附屬組件從如果<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>屬性指定的值<xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName>位置參數。</xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When this is the case, the MissingSatelliteAssemblyException exception is thrown when the resource manager tries to retrieve a resource of the default culture and the satellite assembly for the culture specified in the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute is missing.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況時，資源管理員會嘗試擷取在指定的文化特性的附屬組件的預設文化特性的資源時，會擲回 MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 例外狀況<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>遺漏的屬性。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Note that the exception is thrown by a resource retrieval method such as <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and not when the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，例外狀況擲回的資源擷取方法例如<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，而不會在<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>物件具現化。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY, which has the value 0x80131536.
trans-unit.target: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY，0x80131536 的值。

trans-unit.source: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 會使用預設<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MissingSatelliteAssemblyException class, see the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需 MissingSatelliteAssemblyException 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should always use the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute to define your app's default culture so that if a resource for a specific culture is unavailable, your application will display acceptable behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您應該一律使用<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>屬性來定義您的應用程式的預設文化特性，以便在您的應用程式的特定文化特性的資源無法使用時，會顯示可接受的行為。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>類別</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message for <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息，取得<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>。 |</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>類別</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>從序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的地例外狀況內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>類別</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the name of a neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException"></xref>使用指定的錯誤訊息以及將中性文化特性名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>類別</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 中性文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The app's default culture is defined by the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的預設文化特性由定義<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For a list of culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 如需文化特性名稱的清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 預設文化特性名稱。
